title: Coinbase, Marathon Digital, Lucid: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Bitcoin, ether and dogecoin prices were all down; crypto stocks were caught in the downdraft
body:
Stock futures were edging higher after data showed retail sales rose in October, and cryptocurrencies broadly declined. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Tuesday’s opening bell:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
